phrases: This is still only the seventh day, too.
We have still got twenty-some days to go.
I should have installed hibernation devices.
Are you guys image training again?
Nice for you to be able to pass the time.
You have inherited Goku's blood, and you have been trained by Piccolo, after all.
Still, I was surprised by how many techniques you have, Kuririn.
It is fine for you to train inside your heads,
but the room is starting to get pretty messy, so would you tidy it up for us?
B- but Bulma- san, you are the one who made it messy over there.
We have cleaned up our own messes.
I have got a lot of things to think about.
You guys are just passengers, so that is fine for you.
I thought you just got done saying that you were bored.
I wish you would show a little more consideration toward a delicate lady.
As a lady, I sure wish she would not stroll around in her underwear.
Son- san, you must not do that!
Nurse, I am all better now.
Must be my age, but lately, I do not even know what I am doing.
How many times must I say it before it gets through to you?
If you keep doing that, you will never get to go home.
As you can see, I am all-
You were very severely injured, after all.
You there, Grandpa Glad-hands, give him a hand.
Where is his wife, who is usually with him?
Oh, she probably went to the roof to look up at the sky again.
Gohan- chan, are you doing all right?
I told you over and over to send me a letter every day,
but you have not sent a single one...
Come back to me soon, safe and sound.
By the way, I have been wondering about this for a long time,
but about that Saiyan, Vegeta, who ran away- where did he run away to?
Well, the Saiyans' planet was lost a long time ago, right?
He had taken an awful lot of damage,
so I think it would have to be a civilized planet somewhere.
Could there be such a place?
Earlier, Son- kun's brother mentioned something, remember?
He said that, We exterminate those who live on planets with good environments,
and then sell them to aliens.
Do you think that maybe Vegeta went to one of those aliens' planets to get treated?
If he did, then when he comes back to Earth would depend on where that planet was.
If it were far away, then it would buy us some time.
You know something, that is one terrible fellow who has set his sights on Earth.
T - to think that it would come to this...
It would not be Planet Namek, right?
It is too early for that, to say the least, is not it?
But I do not see anything.
It is too soon to celebrate.
It is coming closer and closer!
It is coming straight toward us.
H- how could they turn in the same direction!?
It looks like the inside of a spaceship,
but even so, there is not a soul around.
I have no idea what is going on here.
There may be some weird aliens hiding from us.
Do not scare us like that!
I- it looks like it is safe to go outside.
Let us go have a look.
Maybe I should have stayed on Earth after all, like Yajirobe.
I forgot to put on some pants first.
But you are wearing them, are not you?
Let us hope you do not embarrass mankind.
It looks like there are some booby traps in here.
Men are to protect ladies at all times!
There should be a doorway into the main room somewhere-
A wall like this will be easy to take care of.
Must be nice for you guys, being able to perform Bukujutsu.
I get the feeling that they want to eliminate any intruders, no matter what.
Suppose Vegeta were to suddenly appear from over there...
Look, I am starting to get goosebumps!
I wonder if that man Vegeta is recovering from his injuries somewhere right now.
I would appreciate it if he would just die.
I will definitely go back there to settle the score!
that we have been walking around the same place in circles for a while now.
There was not anything that looked like a door, huh?
It looks like the real door is down here.
They sure built this thing to be convoluted!
All right, let us try going in here.
You will not catch me falling for that!
Bulma- san, your reflexes are so slow!
It is you guys who are the unusual ones!
We are coming to help you out now!
Please move away from the cage!
Kuririn- san, they are all children!
Is there an adult here that I could speak to?
Give these kids a good hard spanking!
Do not offer any more futile resistance!
Ominously, these children have suddenly appeared.
What exactly is the true nature of this mysterious spaceship?
